summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account from June 1, 2015, to June 30, 2015. It details significant outgoing transfers, including large sums transferred to Morgan Stanley and Southern Trust Company, as well as interest payments and service charges.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Morgan Stanley
events.description: A transfer of $3,050,000.00 was made to Morgan Stanley.

events.title: Outgoing Transfers to Southern Trust Company
events.description: Two transfers were made to Southern Trust Company totaling $575,000.00.

events.title: Outgoing Transfer to Morgan Stanley
events.description: A transfer of $10,000.00 was made to Morgan Stanley.

events.title: Interest Payment
events.description: An interest payment of $9,116.01 was credited to the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $576,970,072.55 as of June 1, 2015.
The ending balance as of June 30, 2015, was $73,344,188.56 after significant outgoing transfers.
A total of $3,635,000.00 was debited from the account during the statement period.
Interest earned during the period was $9,116.01.
Amanda Kirby is listed as a contact for account inquiries.
